attributes.action: UK government to provide economic assistance to the Asian wedding industry.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK Asian wedding industry is facing an unprecedented challenge as a result of the Coronavirus COVID-19 outbreak.

Thousands of weddings have been canceled and the whole industry is uncertain about how it will continue to trade or if they will still have an income or not.

I would like the government to provide support to businesses & individuals struggling at this crucial time.
attributes.background:
Research shows that the Asian wedding sector contributes a whopping £3 billion to the UK economy and the cost of an Asian wedding is often at minimum double the cost of a British one.

This huge industry has been excluded from many of the Government’s Covid-19 financial support packages.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552166

You may also like to sign this petition which calls for a related action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561996

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
